citations.narrative:
The shelter for the large sow has a hog panel flooring that is in disrepair. The bent and twisted wire protruding in
the shelter area could cause injury to the sow. To protect the health of animals; ensure that enclosures and
surfaces that animals contact are well maintained.
Correct by 10/17/19
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.

surfaces that animals contact are well maintained.
